# blastshield_proxies (Data Source)

Lists Blastshield proxys with optional filters.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `domains` (List of String) Filter by domains.
- `exit_agents` (List of String) Filter by exit_agents.
- `groups` (List of Number) Filter by groups.
- `id` (List of Number) Filter by id.
- `name` (List of String) Filter by name.
- `proxy_port` (List of Number) Filter by proxy_port.
- `tags` (List of String) Filter by tags.

### Read-Only

- `proxies` (Attributes List) List of proxies matching the filters. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--proxies))

<a id="nestedatt--proxies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `proxies`

Read-Only:

- `domains` (Set of String)
- `exit_agents` (Set of String)
- `groups` (Set of Number)
- `id` (Number)
- `name` (String)
- `proxy_port` (Number)
- `tags` (Map of String)
